text: hello this is chef john from food wishes
comm with how to make your own instant
hot chocolate mix that's right every
year I try to present one homemade
edible gift idea for those people on
your list that have everything and
that's because even those people don't
have this plus you're going to be
shocked how fast and easy this is to
make this really only takes a few
seconds to put together and features
just four ingredients which I believe is
roughly like eleven greedy n't / than
the one from the store so let's go ahead
and get started with the start of the
show the cocoa so we're going to start
with a cup of the highest quality
unsweetened cocoa you can find and I'm
using a variety called cocoa Rouge which
is why it's so beautiful and by the way
this is what they call a Dutch process
cocoa and I forget exactly what that
means but I know it's really good
and as usual I'll give you a lot more
info on the blogpost especially about
the cocoa but using a really nice one is
key here especially if you're going to
give it for a gift and then to that we
can add the rest of the ingredients
which includes some white sugar as well
as a little bit of fine salt and then
last but not least one technically
optional ingredients a tiny pinch of
cayenne and no it is no gimmick that
tiny touch of pepper really does amplify
those chocolatey flavors so that'll be
up to you you are the Stevie Nicks of
your homemade hot chocolate mix but I do
enjoy it so I'm gonna add a little touch
and then to finish this off all we need
to do is take a whisk and mix this for a
couple minutes until thoroughly combined
and believe it or not that's it our
homemade instant hot chocolate mix is
done and so far superior to the store
bought version you're not going to
believe it in fact you're probably going
to be upset you've been buying that
stuff all these years when you could
have been just mixing up your own in a
matter of seconds but hey at least now
you know and then once that is mixed up
you can use it exactly like this stuff
from the packet will simply stir in two
tablespoons of this into every cup of
hot milk and you'll see as long as your
milk is hot it's going to dissolve them
just as good if not better than the
commercial stuff and then I'm pretty
sure you know the rest will transfer
that into a mug and you're going to be
enjoying one of the finest cups of hot
chocolate you've ever had just
beautifully rich and chocolatey with
just the right amount of sweetness and
I'm sorry I was fresh out of mini
marshmallows but I did have some whipped
cream which is a classic garnish for how
and by classic I mean awesome but anyway
just a truly delicious cup of hot cocoa
so even if you don't have any need to
give out edible gifts I think you should
mix up some of this anyway because it
really is that good and of course if you
are going to give it as a gift you're
going to have to transfer into some kind
of container if for me these little
mason jars work perfectly so we'll
transfer that in and to complete the
operation we can add a little bow as
well as possibly a cool lookin label so
people know what they're getting and get
the instructions about how much to add
and that my friends is an amazing gift
that anyone would love to get except I
guess for those few crazy people that
don't like chocolate but that's fine
they could just regifter and whoever
eventually gets it will love it but
anyway that's it how to make your own
homemade instant hot chocolate mix it's
super fast super easy and significantly
better tasting so I really do hope you
give this a try soon head over to food
wishes calm for all the ingredient
amounts and more info as usual and as
always enjoy
